医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
一种尺寸并不适合节食的所有情况POUNDS Lost 研究发现，虽然不同的饮食产生相似的平均体重减轻效果，但个体反应却存在显着差异，这凸显了个性化饮食方法的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/One-size-does-not-fit-all-when-to-comes-to-dieting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/One-size-does-not-fit-all-when-to-comes-to-dieting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bec1fd6-b75b-44f5-afe7-d93bd3d48154 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 00:11:00 -0400 One size does not fit all when to comes to dieting
研究人员发现治疗与 1 型 T 细胞白血病病毒相关疾病的新靶标宾夕法尼亚州立大学医学院的一组研究人员发现了治疗与人类 T 细胞白血病病毒 1 型 (HTLV-1) 相关疾病的新靶标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Researchers-discover-new-target-for-treating-diseases-linked-to-T-cell-leukemia-virus-type-1.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Researchers-discover-new-target-for-treating-diseases-linked-to-T-cell-leukemia-virus-type-1.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4987d38c-5b75-43b1-b95e-50941edc916f Mon, 22 Jul 2024 23:40:16 -0400 Researchers discover new target for treating diseases linked to T-cell leukemia virus type 1
阿拉巴马大学研究人员研究了心血管健康评分对死亡率预测的功效阿拉巴马大学伯明翰分校 Marnix E. Heersink 医学院的医生科学家进行了一项全国性研究，评估心血管健康评分对死亡率的预测价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/UAB-researchers-examine-the-efficacy-of-cardiovian-health-scores-for-mortality-prediction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/UAB-researchers-examine-the-efficacy-of-cardioangio-health-scores-for-mortality-prediction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9aa78138-2ebf-47c5-8657-400e068fb8e1 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 23:33:28 -0400 UAB researchers examine the efficacy of cardiovascular health scores for mortality prediction
睡眠不规律和快速眼动睡眠不佳与慢性疾病风险增加有关与健康记录相关的可穿戴设备的纵向数据显示，不规则的睡眠模式和快速眼动睡眠不足会增加患高血压和抑郁症等慢性疾病的风险。这强调了持续和高质量的睡眠对于整体健康的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Irregular-sleep-and-poor-REM-sleep-linked-to-higher-risk-of-chronic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Irregular-sleep-and-poor-REM-sleep-linked-to-higher-risk-of-chronic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e15d6200-14f6-4fbd-8510-a5b21960b248 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 23:33:00 -0400 Irregular sleep and poor REM sleep linked to higher risk of chronic diseases
研究：胃肠道状况与颅内动脉瘤的发展和破裂有关根据今天在神经介入外科学会 (SNIS) 第 21 届年会上发表的研究，某些胃肠道 (GI) 综合征的诊断与颅内（脑）动脉瘤的形成和破裂之间存在潜在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Study-GI-conditions-tied-to-intraranial-aneurysm-development-and-rupture.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Study-GI-conditions-tied-to-intraranial-aneurysm-development-and-rupture.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b42f6ade-1107-4282-96ac-f2964bd0ad40 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 23:28:00 -0400 Study: GI conditions tied to intracranial aneurysm development and rupture
新协议改善了特拉华州的中风手术机会和结果根据今天在神经介入外科学会 (SNIS) 第 21 届年会上发布的研究，改变评估和治疗疑似中风患者的标准程序已改善了特拉华州挽救生命的中风手术的机会，并应为全国范围内的分诊和治疗提供信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/New-protocols-improve-中风-surgery-access-and-outcomes-in-Delaware.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/New-protocols-improve-中风-surgery-access-and-outcomes-in-Delaware.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c4ad68c-5dad-4924-99cb-ebe3b1f00423 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 23:17:00 -0400 New protocols improve stroke surgery access and outcomes in Delaware
北欧大型研究表明，新冠疫苗和妊娠早期感染不会增加出生缺陷的风险对丹麦、瑞典和挪威 343,066 名婴儿的研究表明，在妊娠前三个月，感染 COVID-19 或接种疫苗不会增加先天性异常的风险。该研究证实了安全性，支持孕妇接种疫苗的建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/COVID-vaccines-and-infections-in-early-pregnancy-show-no-increased-risk-of-birth-defects-in-large-Nordic-研究.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/COVID-vaccines-and-infections-in-early-pregnancy-show-no-increased-risk-of-birth-defects-in-large-Nordic-研究.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce6dc0c3-fa86-43c8-ba32-5faa6bfd917d Mon, 22 Jul 2024 22:53:00 -0400 COVID vaccines and infections in early pregnancy show no increased risk of birth defects in large Nordic study
社会经济因素影响煤矿区脑卒中手术结果今天在神经介入外科学会 (SNIS) 第 21 届年会上发表的研究强调了社会经济变量的作用及其在中风手术后成功恢复中的作用，特别是生活在煤矿县的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Socioeconomic-factors-impact-中风-surgery-outcomes-in-coal-mining-areas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Socioeconomic-factors-impact-中风-surgery-outcomes-in-coal-mining-areas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15e31159-e717-4e77-ab6d-f7490c50889c Mon, 22 Jul 2024 22:51:00 -0400 Socioeconomic factors impact stroke surgery outcomes in coal-mining areas
专家推出首个精准医学研究综合指南弗吉尼亚大学医学院的一位科学家和来自世界各地的其他顶级专家制定了第一份报告尖端“精准医学”研究的综合指南，以改善患者护理和世界各地人民的健康公平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Experts-unveil-first-compressive-guidelines-for- precision-medicine-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Experts-unveil-first-compressive-guidelines-for- precision-medicine-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f3345e5-8f8d-4d8a-b2e7-ae82aa4f5004 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 22:46:55 -0400 Experts unveil first comprehensive guidelines for precision medicine research
Stockholm3 血液检测可有效检测不同种族的前列腺癌《临床肿瘤学杂志》上发表的一篇新论文称，瑞典卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员开发的 Stockholm3 血液检测在检测不同种族的前列腺癌方面同样有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Stockholm3-blood-test-proves- effective-at-Detecting-prostate-cancer-in- Different-ethnic-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Stockholm3-blood-test-proves- effective-at-Detecting-prostate-cancer-in- Different-ethnic-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac999945-a3a7-4cd5-8cf3-6d096b633810 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 22:38:31 -0400 Stockholm3 blood test proves effective at detecting prostate cancer in different ethnic groups
